basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Management and Management Information Systems in the Department of Management and Industrial Relations and Information Technology Management Department at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

education.area: Management and Management Information Systems (expected Spring, 2025)
